description.value:
Your body is suffused with raw plant life. When you bloodrage, your plantlike characteristics bolster your durability and grant you some control over vegetation.

Bonus Feats:

  • Bolstered Resilience,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Diehard}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{Endurance}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • Raging Vitality,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{Entangle} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lviqtqs3y2ebkinr]{Greensight} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.auvsi3fenss2hga9]{Burst of Nettles} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{Command Plants} (16th)
